title: Local Resident Failure - This Here's The Hard Part [FLAC]
description:
Local Resident Failure - This Here's The Hard Part (2015) [FLAC]

  Genre: Rock
  Style: Punk-Pop
  Source: WEB
  Codec: FLAC
  Bit rate: ~ 1,000
  Bit depth: 16
  Sample rate: 44.1 kHz

  01 Around The World 
  02 A Friend Named Hope 
  03 Old Skool
  04 Brainwashed 
  05 Long Night 
  06 Rockstar 
  07 Roll On 2 
  08 Into The Unknown 
  09 Failing Heath 
  10 The Shadow Of My Former Self 
  11 Newcastle Nights 
  12 Time Machine 
  13 Sirens 
  14 The Re-Opener 

  This Here's The Hard Part is the new and highly anticipated album Local Resident Failure. After an overnight success in your drummer internet (which is great medleys videos of the most renowned name worldwide punk), the band proves that has unquestionable quality regardless of external factors that may garner more fans for them. On this record we have fourteen tracks from the best melodic punk world. Faster songs, more rhythmic songs, here's a bit of everything, but always converging to a captivating and unique matrix. "Long Night" is one of the great songs on the album that proves all that has been written in this review. Already "Newcastle Nights" is the faster of the album and certainly one of the best, along with the stunning "Time Machine". And to finish in style, the wonderful "The Re-Opener"
